title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4500.3 - General rule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4500.3 - General rule

State Regulations
RIOC shall not adopt any major amendment of the development
plan until there has been a public hearing at which the residents of Roosevelt

Island are provided with an opportunity to comment on such major
amendment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4500.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
